forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 45. North wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun graces the city with its warm embrace this morning, Downtown San Francisco basks in a golden glow, the horizon a sharp outline of the Golden Gate Bridge and the distant hills, all bathed in clarity. The air, unencumbered by fog, hints only at the gentle kiss of a cool breeze, as the city transitions from a cool dawn into a pleasantly mild day. With temperatures approaching the mid-60s, one can feel the promise of a day that invites exploration and leisurely pursuits, unhampered by the usual capricious humidity of the coastal fog.

To best enjoy this inviting day, it would be wise to dress in light layers—perhaps a comfortable sweater or a breezy jacket to accommodate the cooler moments as the sun dips behind the buildings. Consider a stroll through the nearby parks or a quiet café visit, where you can savor a warm cup while watching the world unfold around you. The splendid visibility may also beckon you to a rooftop perch or a wander along the waterfront. With the sun illuminating the cityscape, this day is a rare opportunity to experience San Francisco in its most flattering light.
